sentences.en: Anglers are required to obtain prior authorization from the park keeper.
sentences.cn: 垂钓者必须事先得到公园管理者的许可.

sentences.en: Can plants obtain adequate nourishment from such poor soil?
sentences.cn: 土壤这样贫瘠，植物能获得足够的养分吗？

sentences.en: Evans was trying to obtain a false passport and other documents.
sentences.cn: 埃文斯正试图取得一本假护照和其他证件。

sentences.en: He has enough money to obtain the necessaries of life.
sentences.cn: 他有足够的钱购买生活必需品

sentences.en: He lowballed the cost of the project in order to obtain federal funding.
sentences.cn: 他为了得到联邦资助而故意压低项目的成本价格。

sentences.en: I could obtain with the snap of my fingers anything I chose.
sentences.cn: 我不费吹灰之力就可以得到我看中的任何东西。

sentences.en: It is strictly forbidden to obtain confessions and to give them credence.
It's far beyond reach of our ability to obtain such aim.
sentences.cn: 按我们的能力这种目标是不可企及的.

sentences.en: Offshoring provides an opportunity to obtain I.T. services at low cost.
sentences.cn: 离岸外包提供了以低成本获得信息技术服务的机会。

sentences.en: Only with mass direct action will we obtain such change.
sentences.cn: 只有采取大规模直接行动，我们才会取得这样的改变。

sentences.en: There was a lot of pressure on you to obtain good grades.
sentences.cn: 你背负了拿到高分的巨大压力。

sentences.en: They were plotting how to obtain the necessary information.
sentences.cn: 他们正在策划如何获取必要的情报.

sentences.en: To obtain her degree, she answered 81 questions over 10 papers.
sentences.cn: 为获得学位，她回答了10页纸上的81个问题。

sentences.en: Underage youths can obtain alcohol from their older friends.
sentences.cn: 未到法定年龄的青少年可以从年龄较大的朋友那里弄到酒。

sentences.en: You can obtain the product from all good chemists.
sentences.cn: 你可从各大药房买到这种产品。

phrases.tran_cn: 获得信息；索取资料或合同

trans.tran_en: to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

trans.tran_cn: 通用， 流行， 存在
trans.tran_en: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work
